rules.description: (Vim 1/11) caps_lock -> on, caps_lock, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off

to_if_alone.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'

to_if_held_down.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Release [caps lock] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'

rules.description: (Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Press [v] again to go back to Vim Mode" with title "-- VISUAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press [i] to leave" with title "-- NORMAL --"'
